snippet.title: Ready Set Indie Games Presents: Out of Sight (PC)
snippet.description:
In this gameplay video from Ready Set Indie Games, TripG87 plays Out of Sight. Out of Sight is an indie point and click adventure game that is based off of Salvic mythology.

If you would like to play this game you can do so for free by visiting:

https://apivenstudios.itch.io/outofsight

The Game is Playable on the Following Platforms:
PC
macOS
 -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/readysetindiegames
